thread.title: Sarah Davis
thread.title_full: Official Car Mats reviewed by Sarah Davis

author: Sarah Davis
title: Sarah Davis
text:
Lovely mats that fit perfectly. They have a strong 'tooth' on the underside to grip the car carpet to ensure they don't slide about. The driver's side clips simply and accurately into place, so no 'bunching' under the clutch pedal or curling at the edges.
Delivery was fair - about a week. Arrived the same day as my car, so I was very happy!
